snippet.title: Costly Adventure Steam Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Costly Adventure is upcoming rogue-lite Match-3 game from Postperson Studio. Wishlist it on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2014480/Costly_Adventure/

Party of adventurers is seeking a mighty artifact but they must meet the ever increasing payment demands from the bridge Troll. Your choice of specialization, talents and itemization will change how you play every time.

Links:
Website: http://postpersonstudio.com/costly-adventure
Steam page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2014480/Costly_Adventure/
